name: PushOps
description:
PUSHOPS


PushOps is a roguelike with a twist:
There are no weapons!

As a player, you must manipulate physics objects to survive.
Fast moving blocks will deal damage.

FEATURES:


  • 3 level types, alongside a final boss
  • Endless mode
  • 21 unique custom items
  • 6 playable characters (can buy in the shop)
  • Many different enemy types
  • Colourblind modes
  • 6 different block types, with unique properties
  • Destructable environment
  • Speedrun timers

All Music by HeatlyBros.


Check out his YouTube channel!
